name: Add a new todo
title: Add a new todo

testSteps.description: When Alex opens the todo app for the first time
Then his todo list should be empty

children.description: Alex ensures that the number of displayed items does equal 0

testSteps.description: When Alex adds a new todo "Buy groceries"

children.description: Alex enters "Buy groceries" into page element located by css ('.new-todo')

testSteps.description: Then he should see the new todo "Buy groceries" in the list

children.description: Alex ensures that the text of the first of displayed items does equal "Buy groceries"

testSteps.description: Given Alex has added a new todo "Buy groceries"

children.description: Alex enters "Buy groceries" into page element located by css ('.new-todo')
Alex ensures that <<the first of page elements located by css ('.todo-list li')>>.text() does equal "Buy groceries"

testSteps.description: When Alex marks the todo "Buy groceries" as completed

exception.message:
locator.scrollIntoViewIfNeeded: Error: strict mode violation: locator('//label[text()=\'Buy groceries\']/preceding-sibling::input[@type=\'checkbox\']') resolved to 2 elements:
    1) <input class="toggle" type="checkbox" _ngcontent-rmk-c19=""/> aka getByRole('checkbox').nth(1)
    2) <input class="toggle" type="checkbox" _ngcontent-rmk-c19=""/> aka getByRole('checkbox').nth(2)

Call log:
  - waiting for locator('//label[text()=\'Buy groceries\']/preceding-sibling::input[@type=\'checkbox\']')

testSteps.description: Then he should see the todo "Buy groceries" marked as completed
